"My research deals with DNA adaptation" Lady Hawk replied she knows 
now what type of faction she's dealing with. "But I'm sure anything 
can be used as a weapon. "For instance imagine the possibilities of a 
unit landing in hostile territory with the DNA sequence of some of 
the deadliest predators in the galaxy already programmed into it." 
Exploration, invading, the words meant nothing to her the only 
importance was her fathers dream to make Optimus Primes words come 
true. all she could think was "Till all are one."

"I can see that you aren't interested in possibilities so I'll take 
my leave and research somewhere else." She had placed a bluff in 
front of DevilDuer now it was up to him to see the stakes.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> I just realized I forgot to post this for a few days. Sorry 
Cyberwolf!
> 
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer glances at the hand, his mind working over what the femm 
had just 
> said. Research? That could be usefull for the Alliance
> 
> "Wait just a moment here!" he says, his tone suddenly twice as 
friendly, "I 
> didn't mean to lead you out just yet! We might be able to use ya, 
after all! 
> What kind of research do you do? Weapons and such?"
